department.dept_long_name: Department of Organismic and Evolutionary Biology

course.title: In Sickness and in Health: Topics in Symbiosis
course.description: Critical review and discussion of current issues in symbiosis. Emphasis is on microbe-eukaryote symbioses ranging from mutualistic to pathogenic associations. In 2011 the course will focus on the human microbiome and topics selected by faculty and students.
course.prerequisites: Life Sciences 1a, 1b or equivalent, microbial science, or permission of instructor.
